justification: The candidate does not meet the minimum degree requirement of Telecommunications Engineering but has a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, which is not preferred by company insights.
No relevant experience with wireless telecommunications industry systems or technology as specified by job description.
The candidate's skills do not align with the specific technologies and experience required, such as Huawei and Nokia equipment or GSM, UMTS, LTE, NR.
The resume shows no relevant leadership nor project management experience in telecommunication projects.

requirements.criteria: Experience with Huawei and Nokia equipment
Proficiency in GSM, UMTS, LTE, and NR technologies

input.job_description:
### Job Title: Senior Wireless Integration Engineer

#### Company: FutureNet Solutions

**Location**: Islamabad, Pakistan

**Job Summary**:  
As a Senior Wireless Integration Engineer, you will join FutureNet Solutions to lead and oversee telecommunication projects across multiple regions. Your responsibilities will include managing cross-functional teams, integrating wireless networks, and coordinating with field teams to ensure quality and timely delivery.

**Key Responsibilities**:
- Provide remote delivery services for multiple countries, conducting both pre-integration checks and post-integration validations.
- Oversee the integration of 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G NR wireless sites using advanced tools such as Web CME, Cloud CME, and MML commands.
- Coordinate with field teams to supervise installations and resolve on-site technical issues.
- Prepare and manage project schedules and ensure completion in line with client specifications.
- Perform site audits and equipment testing, including Huawei BTS and transmission nodes.
- Act as a key technical support contact for troubleshooting and logical problem resolution.

**Skills & Qualifications**:
- Bachelor’s degree in Telecommunications Engineering or a related field.
- 8+ years of experience in wireless and telecommunications engineering.
- Strong knowledge of GSM, UMTS, LTE, NR technologies, and network troubleshooting.
- Proficiency in Huawei and Nokia RAN-SRAN equipment.
- Excellent leadership, communication, and project management skills.
- Ability to work independently and handle multiple projects under tight deadlines.

**Salary**: Competitive salary with benefits commensurate with experience.

**How to Apply**: Submit your CV and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience to careers@futurenetsolutions.com by [Deadline].
input.additional_info: FutureNet Solutions actively seeks candidates from top engineering institutions such as BUITEMS and NUST, with a preference for candidates holding professional engineering certifications. Our hiring process includes technical assessments and multiple interview stages. We offer relocation assistance for qualified candidates and provide both on-site and remote work options based on project needs.
minimum_requirements: Experience with Huawei and Nokia equipment
Proficiency in GSM, UMTS, LTE, and NR technologies

ABOUT ME
As a software engineering graduate, I specialize in AI, computer vision, machine learning, and statistical analysis.
Proﬁcient in full-stack development with Python Flask, MySQL, and React, I excel in crafting robust web applications
and solving AI challenges, and always eager to explore the latest advancements. 
WORK EXPERIENCE

deploy robust LLM models tailored to solve complex business problems and develop AI-based solutions.

collection, storage, and processing of large NLP datasets, facilitating smooth and scalable data workﬂows.

evaluation to streamline NLP workﬂows and improve model performance.

•Computer Vision Expertise: Integrated computer vision methodologies to analyze and interpret visual data

•REST API Development: Created and managed REST APIs to facilitate communication between frontend and

•Database Management: Proﬁciently managed databases such as MySQL, ensuring data integrity, security, and
accessibility for various applications.
•Stripe Payment Integration: Implemented Stripe payment solutions to enable secure and eﬃcient transaction
